contents: Silsilah-i shaykhīyah -- [Untitled work on the Divine Names, perhaps by Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Ṣādiq al-Shīrāzī].
contributors: Kirmānī, Muḥammad Karīm Khān, -1871 or 1872, author.
Shīrāzī, Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Muḥammad Ṣādiq, possible author.
item.title: Silsilah-i shaykhīyah
notes: Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site.
Pagination: 6 blank leaves; 1st work: fol. 1b-168a (15 lines); 3 blank leaves; 2nd work: fol. 172b-175a (12 lines)
Gift of Cyrus Ebrahim Zadeh, Nov. 9, 2009.
Paper: yellowish, cream color paper with visible watermark; black ink with rubrication and overlining in red; catchwords.
Naskh; First work: 15 lines in written area 12.5 x 6.5 cm.; Second work: 12 lines in written area 12 x 6 cm.
6 blank leaves; fol. 1b-168a (1st work); 3 blank leaves; fol. 172b-175a (2nd work)
Binding: flexible red leather binding with embossed frame lines.
created_published: Fī sābiʻ shahr Shawwāl sanat ithnayn wa-thamānīn baʻda al-miʼatayn min al-alf al-thānī [7 Shawwāl 1282 = 23 February 1866]
medium: vi, 175 leaves, paper : bound ; 17.4 x 10.5 cm

title: Silsilah-i shaykhīyah
description: Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site. Manuscript. Persian. Title from folio 3a.
